casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Keith Lavoris HALL 14P09-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Keith Lavoris, Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of NC. Dylan J.C. Buffum, Attorney at Law, for Hall.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of July 2018 by State of NC to Dismiss Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
